body:
Grr, yes.  Ok, what about:

tensor_in_sizes=[1, 7, 7, 1]
filter_in_sizes=[2, 2, 1, 1]
strides = [3, 3]

If that doesn't work, forget it, and just add a TODO to add a more meaningful "SAME" test for stride > ksize.
